channel.title: Home Assistant on Alex' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home Assistant on Alex' Blog

item.title: LaMetric Firmware 1.7.5
item.description: A new firmware for the LaMetric Time is out – version 1.7.5 has some nice things to offer for those of us who would like to use the device in home automation (sadly the documentation is not yet updated). While this has been announced in the change log for 1.7.4, there have been some bugs and there are still one or two things that needs fixing, but that’s just minor stuff.
